backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to AboutSection.tsx image handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries of all frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing navbar, content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Interactive contact form with validation, submission simulation, and success state handling.
Footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and social links.
Responsive navbar with scroll behavior, section navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with profile image, practice description, and qualifications list.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with location, phone, email, response time, confidentiality notice, and an embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with background images, marketing text, and buttons that scroll to contact and services sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Shows four highlight cards describing key strengths like compliance, timeliness, confidentiality, and professionalism.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists multiple CA service offerings using cards, including taxation, GST, accounting, regulatory compliance, and audits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook handling login, stored identities, status flags, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty stub file indicating no backend queries are needed for the marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a professional blue palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing UI update tasks, required images, and pending feature requests for updating the landing page and About section photo.
